snippet: A family of four finds an organized, scenic bike expedition in northern Pennsylvania, in Lehigh Gorge State Park.
abstract: Lehigh Gorge State Park in Pennsylvania offers organized, scenic bike expeditions with trails along historic pathways.
lead_paragraph: A family of four finds an organized, scenic bike expedition in northern Pennsylvania, in Lehigh Gorge State Park.

headline.seo: Family Biking at Lehigh Gorge State Park in Pennsylvania
headline.main: Family Biking at Lehigh Gorge State Park
headline.print_headline: ... A Rural One With Rocks And Rivers
